channel.title: RevNeal's Video Sermon Podcasts
channel.description: The Video Sermons of the Reverend Dr. Gregory S. Neal, United Methodist Pastor and Theologian
channel.copyright: Â© 2011-2013, Dr. Gregory S. Neal - All Rights Reserved
channel.itunes:summary: The Video Sermons of the Reverend Dr. Gregory S. Neal, Senior Pastor of Northgate United Methodist Church of Irving, Texas, and Rector of Grace Incarnate Ministries. Dr. Neal preaches expository sermons based upon the Revised Common Lectionary. His messages are Biblically based, Theologically sound, and relevant to today. RevNeal's Audio Sermons and Bible Studies can also be found on iTunes.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Biblically Based Sermons of a United Methodist Pastor and Theologian
channel.itunes:author: Dr. Gregory S. Neal
